trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_SEQ_00<tab>Nanamo appears to be reassessing her plans.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Hancock in Kugane.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Nanamo in Ul'dah.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Nanamo at the Waking Sands.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Nanamo.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_001<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Profit<var 1A 01 /var>... The thought never even crossed my mind.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_002<tab>But standing about lamenting my naivety will not do anyone any good. I shall consider my lesson learned, and press on.

TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─are you perchance acquainted with any successful merchants? If my attempt at philanthropy is obliged to reap a profit, it would seem wise to consult someone with a knack for business.

TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_004<tab>Hm... Ordinarily, I would not trust any agent of the East Aldenard Trading Company─but if you hold this Hancock fellow in high esteem, I am content to be led by you. You may repay my faith by journeying to distant Kugane and speaking with him on my behalf.

TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_005<tab>Eager though I am to visit those shores, I have not the leisure for a lengthy sea voyage. Now, assuming you will travel as adventurers are wont to do, I shall await your report by the aetheryte in Ul'dah. A fair journey to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─and a <var 1A 02 /var>swift<var 1A 01 /var> one, if you please.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! To what do I owe the pleasure? Or are you here on business?
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_011<tab>...I beg your pardon? Her Grace the sultana would have <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> opinion on how best to invest the wealth of Ul'dah?

TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_012<tab>My dear <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... I have you to thank for this...recognition, I am sure. And I am flattered that you came to me. Truly flattered.

TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_013<tab>But why settle for a lowly apprentice, when you could have the master! Upon matters of profit, there is no living soul better-qualified to advise Her Grace than Chairman Lolorito─a man whose morning “exertions” are said to fill his garderobe with gold!

TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_014<tab>I should be happy to arrange a meeting for you...say, at the Scions' former headquarters in Thanalan? The Waking Sands would seem a suitably <var 1A 02 /var>neutral<var 1A 01 /var> venue for negotiations, don't you think? Fare you well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and may your dealings prove fruitful!
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_HANCOCK_000_015<tab>You will not find a shrewder merchant than Chairman Lolorito. Would that I could be present to witness the back-and-forth of your coming negotiations!
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_020<tab>Welcome back, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Did your merchant friend have any useful advice to share?
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_021<tab>...With <var 1A 02 /var>Lolorito<var 1A 01 /var>!? And you agreed to this!?

TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_022<tab>I am well aware of his standing in the field of business. But I had hoped to keep the Monetarists at arm's length, and <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var> in particular...
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_023<tab>...Nay. I cannot live in fear of the man. I must learn how to treat with him if I am to rule Ul'dah effectively.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_024<tab>Very well! I will meet with Lolorito. Let us go on ahead to the Waking Sands, and prepare for his coming.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_030<tab>So this is where the Scions first congregated... I have heard many tales, but never had occasion to visit.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_031<tab>To work, then. The hour of the meeting draws near, and I would gather my thoughts. Pray see to it that we have the appointed room to ourselves.
TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_040<tab><sigh> I fear it will be many years before I feel comfortable taking part in such negotiations.

TEXT_STMBDB108_02969_NANAMOULNAMO_000_041<tab>But I shall not complain. We have piqued Lolorito's interest and secured his invaluable expertise. Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I could not have done it without you.
